item.title: Are there standards for the annotation of language corpora?
item.description: Some weeks ago, I attended a conference where several of the presenters discussed language corpora they had created as part of different research projects. During the Q&A turn of the last presenter, an award-winning researcher and creator of various corpora, one of the attendees raised their hand and asked: “I have attended five talks today discussing language corpora and each corpus employed different annotation schemes. Wouldn’t it be convenient to have a set of standards for corpus annotation that everyone could use?
